basic_information.scholarship_name: 2nd LT. Jered Ewy Endowed Memorial Scholarship

description: To provide scholarships to UCO students who are an honorably discharged veteran, active duty member or current member of the National Guard or Reserves. Eligibility Requirements Must have a minimum GPA of 2.50 Military experience and documentation 60 completed hours at UCO Demonstrated financial need as shown through FAFSA completion Declared major in Forensic Science, Sociology, or Criminal Justice U.S. Citizen Current student who is an honorably discharged veteran, Active Duty member or current member of the National Guard or Reserves. Discharged veterans must provide a copy of DD214, all other provide appropriate proof (orders, CAC, etc.) This scholarship is available to apply for during the Current UCO Student Application.

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

criteria.description: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"
